# intent

**Instance Property**

The option to use when incorporating the dropped items into your content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var intent: UICollectionViewDropProposal.Intent { get }
```

## Getting the Proposed Drop Location

- **UICollectionViewDropProposal.Intent**: Constants indicating how you intend to handle a drop.
- **UIDropOperation**: Operation types that determine how a drag and drop activity resolves when the user drops a drag item.
